title: Sturdy Cycles Offers Stock Sizing on SC-G UK Made Titanium Gravel Bike
content:
Somerset-based custom bicycle manufacturer Sturdy Cycles is releasing its first ‘off the peg’ titanium gravel bicycle frame, the SC-G. The brand has traditionally focused on ‘made to measure’ titanium bicycles. This new model is available in four fixed sizes and is aimed at customers who do not require the full custom experience…

Perfect for riders who want a top-tier titanium bike without the wait for a custom build, the Sturdy Cycles SC-G brings the same game-changing 3D printing tech pioneered in Sturdy’s renowned fully custom models, all hand-made and meticulously finished in Somerset, at the Sturdy Cycles workshop in Frome.

Prices

  • Frame kit £4800 (inc UK VAT)
  • ENVE/AXS/Sturdy full build £9900 (inc VAT) – Detail below

Design

The SC-G frame kit is designed as a versatile platform from which customers can build a wide range of off-road capable drop bar builds. The frame kit focuses on adaptability and works seamlessly with a wide range of aftermarket components, making it perfect for creating everything from a relaxed all-road bike to a rugged off-road touring machine. With a maximum measured tyre size of 55mm on 700c rims the frame can handle almost any modern gravel bike tyre. The frame features mudguard mounts and a large number of bottle and accessory mounting points.

Geometry

The geometry is typical of a modern gravel bike. Longer chainstays provide stability at speed and on rough terrain as well as additional traction on steep or loose surfaces. A slightly higher stack height allows for a more upright position for comfort on long or tiring rides. The headtube angle provides the straight line stability often favoured on extremely rough terrain.

Tech and Assembly Standards

  • The frame kit features 3D printed titanium junctions which are CNC machined before being welded to drawn titanium tubes at the workshop in Somerset. The frame kit includes a 1.5 inch headset, titanium rear thru axle, titanium bottle boss bolts, and titanium
  • UDH hanger.
  • Headset: DEDA DCR or FSA ACR (1.5 inch upper and lower bearing) – Deda DCR headset included
  • Bottom Bracket: t47-68 (68mm wide T47 threaded shell)
  • Rear axle: 142x12mm – titanium rear thru axle included
  • Derailleur hanger: titanium UDH hanger included
  • Brake Mount: Flat mount 140mm (160mm with adapter)
  • Seatpost diameter: 31.6mm• Design fork length: 395mm
  • Cable routing: via DCR headset system, electronic only advised. wire exit points for Shimano added by request or left blank for wireless derailleur systems
  • Bosses: 2x bottle cage mounts in front triangle, 3rd bottle cage mount under down tube, top tube bags mounts, mudguard mounts.
  • Tyre clearance: 55mm maximum recommended measured tyre width on a 700c rim

Finish

The SC-G features a raw titanium shot-peened finish with a choice of finishes for the downtube logo. The logo can be finished in a contrast brushed titanium finish or a choice of 8 different Cerakote colours. Cerakote is a highly durable ceramic-based paint coating most commonly used in the firearms industry. Known for its durability and scratch resistance, it is a perfect material for a gravel bike frame.

Made in the UK and Available Now

Each frame kit is hand-made and finished to order. Based on current stock levels, lead times are approximately 3-6 weeks. Once a customer has placed an order, Tom and Jack will begin the manufacturing process.

Sturdy’s Frome-based workshop uses advanced CNC machining to precisely finish critical interfaces on 3D-printed parts. We combine this with manual machining and traditional hand tools to ensure every frame meets our high standards. All Sturdy Cycles frames are prepared, welded, and finished by hand under one roof.

The workshop hosts a range of professional finishing equipment including parts tumbling, polishing, glass bead blasting and wet spray painting using ceramic coatings. Sturdy Cycles is proud to be one of the only UK-based titanium bicycle manufacturers physically manufacturing, finishing, and assembling everything produced in-house. Sturdy is always happy to organise workshop visits for customers and international shipping is available.

ENVE/AXS/Sturdy Complete Build

Example build as described £9900 (inc VAT). The frame kit is also available to purchase fully built with the following components:

  • ENVE In-Route Gravel Fork
  • ENVE In-Route Aero Road Stem
  • ENVE G Series Integrated Gravel Handlebar
  • ENVE Aero Stem Computer and Camera Mount
  • ENVE Seatpost
  • Sram AXS Apex XPLR 12 speed Groupset
  • Sram Bottom Bracket Dub
  • Sturdy OEM carbon spoke Gravel Wheelset
  • Fizik Terra Argo X5
  • Pirelli Cinturato Adventure Folding Gravel Tyres 45mm
  • Full build weight – Medium ~8.8kg
